purpose: Region-Local SI - Address Codex Dilution Critique

rho_definition.note: rho_head is Paper 3 consistent, rho_kv for backward compatibility

codex_critique.original: Late = 0% not proven because SI is global. Late-noise diluted by 30 unaffected layers.
codex_critique.fix: V3 computes SI only from heads in target layer range (region-local SI).
codex_critique.expected: If Late truly immune, Local SI also = 0%. If dilution artifact, Local SI != 0%.
